title: #175 - Kira Soltanovich & ME
description: Comedian Kira Soltanovich hangs out with me (& at 2 hours in my wife LeeAnn) in the Mancave to talk about her new comedy special "YOU DID THIS TO ME" which she shot 7 months pregnant, peeing her pants during it, the state of the entertainment industry, social media, spanking our children, and like I said, at 2 hours in my wife shows up and they share horror stories about their mothers.
